trip.name: Mumbai Adventure
trip.description: Explore the vibrant city of Mumbai with this comprehensive 3-day itinerary covering the best attractions, food, and cultural experiences.

activity.name: Gateway of India
activity.description: Start your day at Mumbai's most iconic landmark. This historic monument was built to commemorate the visit of King George V and Queen Mary to Bombay in 1911.

activity.name: Taj Mahal Palace Hotel
activity.description: Visit the legendary Taj Mahal Palace Hotel, a symbol of luxury and heritage. Take a guided tour to learn about its rich history and architecture.

activity.name: Colaba Causeway Shopping
activity.description: Explore the vibrant Colaba Causeway market for souvenirs, street food, and local crafts. Perfect for lunch and shopping.

activity.name: Marine Drive
activity.description: Walk along the famous Marine Drive, also known as the Queen's Necklace, for stunning views of the Arabian Sea and city skyline.

activity.name: Juhu Beach
activity.description: Visit Juhu Beach to experience the local beach culture, enjoy street food, and watch the sunset over the Arabian Sea.

activity.name: Elephanta Caves
activity.description: Take a ferry to Elephanta Island to explore the ancient cave temples dedicated to Lord Shiva. A UNESCO World Heritage site.

activity.name: Crawford Market
activity.description: Explore the historic Crawford Market, known for its fresh produce, spices, and local delicacies. Great for lunch and shopping.

activity.name: Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus
activity.description: Visit the magnificent Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus, a UNESCO World Heritage site and one of India's most beautiful railway stations.

activity.name: Dharavi Slum Tour
activity.description: Take a guided tour of Dharavi, one of Asia's largest slums, to understand the real Mumbai and see the community's entrepreneurial spirit.

activity.name: Bandra Bandstand
activity.description: Evening walk at Bandra Bandstand, a popular promenade with beautiful sea views and a great place to experience Mumbai's nightlife.

activity.name: Haji Ali Dargah
activity.description: Visit the famous Haji Ali Dargah, a mosque and tomb located on an islet off the coast of Worli. A spiritual and architectural marvel.

activity.name: Worli Sea Face
activity.description: Walk along Worli Sea Face for stunning views of the Bandra-Worli Sea Link and the Arabian Sea. Perfect for photography.

activity.name: Bandra West Food Tour
activity.description: Explore the trendy Bandra West area with its cafes, restaurants, and street food. Try local favorites like vada pav and pav bhaji.

activity.name: National Museum
activity.description: Visit the Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj Vastu Sangrahalaya (formerly Prince of Wales Museum) to explore India's rich cultural heritage.

activity.name: Nariman Point Sunset
activity.description: End your Mumbai adventure with a beautiful sunset at Nariman Point, watching the city lights come alive over the Arabian Sea.
